summary: Mourning his dead child, a haunted Vietnam War veteran attempts to uncover his past while suffering from a severe case of dissociation. To do so, he must decipher reality and life from his own dreams, delusions, and perceptions of death.
cast: Tim Robbins|Elizabeth Peña|Danny Aiello|Matt Craven|Pruitt Taylor Vince|Jason Alexander|Patricia Kalember|Eriq La Salle|Ving Rhames|Brian Tarantina|Anthony Alessandro|Brent Hinkley|S. title: La escalera de Jacob
